hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir data
mkdir completed
find data/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \;
find completed/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \;
mkdir -p /opt/local/hpds/all/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/variantStore.javabin /opt/local/hpds/all/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/vcfIndex.tsv data/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/completed/GLOBAL_allConcepts.csv data/
java -jar jars/VcfIndexSync.jar
mv completed/mappings.csv /opt/local/hpds/mappings.csv
java -cp jars/etl-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar edu.harvard.hms.dbmi.avillach.hpds.data.genotype.util.RemapPatientIds
ts=$(date +"%m-%d-%y")
aws s3 cp /opt/local/hpds/all/variantStoreRemapped.javabin s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/variantStoreRemapped_${ts}.javabin
